articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Urges U.S. to Sit at Negotiating Table, to Begin with
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Urges U.S. to Sit at Negotiating Table, to Begin with
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA today as regards the ongoing visit to the United States by its delegation:
					 The delegation led by the director general of the U.S. Affairs Department of the Foreign Ministry is staying in the U.S. to attend the 20th Session of the Northeast Asia Cooperation Dialogue sponsored by the University of California Institute on Global Conflict and Cooperation and the exchange of views between the DPRK and the U.S. organized by the National Committee on American Foreign Policy.
					
					 While staying there the delegation responded to the request made by the ambassador of the U.S. Department of State for contact.
					
					 This contact was not a preliminary one for the DPRK-U.S. talks and, accordingly, no discussion has been made there on any substantial issue concerning the bilateral dialogue.
					
					 It is the stand of the DPRK already known to the world that it will go out for multilateral talks depending on the outcome of the DPRK-U.S. talks to be kicked off before anything else and the six-party talks are included in the multilateral talks. 
					
					 This stand of the DPRK proceeded from the principled and reasonable assertion that if the Korean Peninsula is to be denuclearized the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. should be settled to give priority to the process of totally removing the root source that spawned the DPRK's access to nukes. 
					
					 The past six year-long course of the six-party talks proved that no matter how frequently the six parties meet, it is nothing but an armchair argument unless the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. are settled and confidence is built between them. The U.S. pulled up only the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and even brought up the issue for discussion at the UN Security Council, putting into effect sanctions against the latter. This resulted in violating the principles of respecting sovereignty and sovereign equality, the basic spirit of the September 19 joint statement, and reducing it to a dead document. 
					
					 The political sovereignty of the DPRK was not only violated but it suffered a huge economic loss. The construction of atomic power stations to be operated by graphite-moderated reactors which had been under way with much effort since the 1980s was suspended but the provision of two light water reactors which had been promised as a compensation for them ended in smoke. The DPRK received little economic reward for disabling its nuclear facilities in Nyongbyon.
					
					 In the final analysis, only the DPRK plan to develop its own nuclear power industry with a capacity of two million Kw was scuttled. 
					
					 It is the conclusion drawn by the DPRK that the DPRK and the U.S., the parties concerned, should sit at a negotiating table, to begin with, to seek a reasonable solution. 
					
					 If the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. are settled and confidence is built between them, there will be meaningful progress in realizing the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 As the DPRK was magnanimous enough to clarify the stand that it is possible to hold multilateral talks including the six-party talks depending on the talks with the U.S., now is the U.S. turn. If the U.S. is not ready to sit at a negotiating table with the DPRK, it will go its own way.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Dominican President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Dominican President
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday sent a message of greetings to Nicholas Liverpool, President of the Commonwealth of Dominica, on the occasion of the 31st anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the friendly Dominican people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Portuguese PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Portuguese PM
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Kim Yong Il sent a message of greetings to Jose Socrates Carvalho Pinto de Sousa on October 27 on his appointment as Prime Minister of Portugal.
					The message sincerely wished the Prime Minister great success in his work for the stability and development of the country and the promotion of the people's welfare.
					
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to Luis Amado on the same day on his reappointment as foreign minister of Portugal.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kwangju Student Incident Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kwangju Student Incident Marked
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang City meeting was held at the Central Youth Hall Monday to mark the lapse of 80 years since the Kwangju student incident.
					 Attending the meeting were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kang Ryon Hak, presidium member of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, An Kyong Ho, director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, university presidents, college rectors and working people and youth and students in the city.
					
					 The action of youth and students in Kwangju was triggered off by the incident that took place late in October Juche 18 (1929) in which Japanese students molested and insulted Korean girl students on a Kwangju-Raju train. Korean youth and students stayed away from classes all at once on Nov. 3 and staged an anti-Japanese demonstration. They bravely fought against Japanese imperialist army and police hell-bent on the suppression.
					
					 This struggle rapidly spilled over into Pyongyang, Seoul, Sinuiju, Hamhung, Taegu, Pusan and all other parts of Korea.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, in a report said that the Kwangju student incident was an eruption of the Koreans' pent-up grudge and resentment at the Japanese imperialist aggressors and a mass anti-Japanese resistance to achieve the independence of the country and the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 This incident taught a serious lesson that in order to force the foreign forces out of Korea and achieve the country's independence and the nation's sovereignty all Koreans should unite close as one behind a great leader and it is necessary to combine the student movement with struggle involving broad masses including workers and peasants and develop it into an all-people struggle for national liberation.
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea and victoriously led the glorious anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to realize the historic cause of national liberation that the desire of the Kwangju students and other Korean people for the country's independence became a reality. 
					
					The undying feats the President performed by building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, and laying a solid foundation for national reunification are shining more brilliantly thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 80 years have passed since the incident but the struggle for putting an end to outsiders' domination and interference and achieving sovereignty nationwide still goes on, the reporter said, calling upon all the Koreans to courageously turn out to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: Football Finals of DPRK Championships Held
articles.content:
Football Finals of DPRK Championships Held
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- The finals of the football tournament of the DPRK Championships were held in Pyongyang on November 2.
					 The final match between the men's football teams of the Ministry of Light Industry Sports Team and the Amnokgang Sports Team was held in Kim Il Sung Stadium, at which the former defeated the latter with the score of 1-0 and thus placed first.
					
					 At the final held in Yanggakdo Football Stadium between the women's soccer teams of the April 25 Sports Team and the Sobaeksu Sports Team, the former beat the latter 3-1 to win the championship.

articles.title: Cinemas and Theatres of Pyongyang Draw Full Houses
articles.content:
Cinemas and Theatres of Pyongyang Draw Full Houses
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Cinemas and theatres of Pyongyang are crowded with visitors these days.
					 Screened at the cinema houses are the newly released Korean feature films "White Birch of Paektu", "Shipwreck", "The Country I Saw" (Parts 2 and 3), "Lifeline" and other films and several pieces of foreign films.
					
					The Taedongmun Cinema, which was reconstructed as a monumental edifice of the Songun era, has been visited by more than 128,000 working people at all strata, school youth and students, Koreans overseas and foreigners staying in Korea in the period from June to October.
					
					 The opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber" and the drama "A Sentry under a Neon Lamp", which were recreated in line with the requirement of the new era, are being put on the stage at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre every day before full houses.
					
					 The performance of the State Symphony Orchestra is going on at the Moranbong Theatre, winning acclamation of the audience. 
					
					 The cinemas and theatres organize scrupulous operation so as to provide better cultural and emotional life to the working people who are all out in the 100-day campaign.

articles.title: U.S. Scheme for Preemptive Nuclear Attack Slashed
articles.content:
U.S. Scheme for Preemptive Nuclear Attack Slashed
						
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. secretary of Defence, together with south Korean military brass hats, released a "joint statement" that reaffirmed the U.S. commitment to the provision of "extended deterrent" including "nuclear umbrella." In another development the chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff asserted, when he flew to Japan after having a war confab in south Korea, that the "extended deterrent" has so far played a big role in ensuring the security of U.S. allies, and expressed the stand against "non-use of nuclear weapons first".
					 Such behaviors were indicative of the dangerous scenario of the U.S. imperialists to provoke a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost, Rodong Sinmun Monday points out in a signed commentary.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea have called "military committee", "consultative meeting on security matters" and the like every year, changing venues. However, the recent war confab is unprecedented in the light of provocative nature and danger.
					
					 The U.S. boldly unveiled its design to invade the DPRK by hinting that it would feed into the second Korean war, to be provoked by it, not only the existing wartime reinforcements but also the U.S. forces deployed across the world.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the said "joint statement" specifies the "extended deterrent", a military conception that was represented for the first time in a "joint statement" of the U.S.-south Korea "security consultative meeting" in 2006.
					
					 The U.S. oft-repeated call for "dialogue" is nothing but a deceptive trick intended to disarm and stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 It is the height of folly for the U.S. to calculate that it would get something through the preemptive nuclear attack. 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent will be bolstered if the U.S. persists in the nuclear confrontation without willingness to make a switchover in its policy of aggression on the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA on Sure Victory of Socialism
articles.content:
KCNA on Sure Victory of Socialism
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- 15 years have passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Socialism Is a Science" was made public.
					 The vitality and validity of the work have been clearly proved in practice as it comprehensively testifies to the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism, the ideal of the popular masses aspiring after independence and a revolutionary banner.
					
					 When socialism collapsed in a number of countries at the end of the 20th century the imperialists and reactionaries claimed that socialism failed and its idea was wrong in a desperate bid to turn the world into a capitalist one.
					
					 They trumpeted that such a "globalization" would bring what they called "opportunity" and "prosperity".
					
					 But those countries which accepted it were thrown into a political mayhem and socio-economic catastrophe, forcing their peoples to suffer misfortune and pain.
					
					 The "globalization" advocated by capitalism faced a crisis and was snubbed in different parts of the world.
					
					 Entering the new century the imperialists sought a way out of the crisis in "anti-terror war," i.e. "globalization" of "liberal democracy" supported by military means.
					
					 This, however, has driven them into a more serious crisis.
					
					 The chaotic financial policy of the U.S. aimed at weathering the financial difficulties created by its "anti-terror war" only facilitated the collapse of the real estate market and deepened the financial crisis. This rapidly developed into worldwide economic crisis due to the economic "globalization".
					
					 The worldwide economic panic coupled with food, energy and environmental crises amidst the jungle law-dominated mayhem, a product of the "globalization" of capitalism, is more seriously threatening the existence of humankind than ever before.
					
					 Such a tragic situation foretells the end of individualism, liberalism and the capitalist "globalization" and the "end of the history" of the imperialist reactionaries.
					
					 The catastrophic consequences of the "globalization" of capitalism and its collapse after the demise of the Cold War are an inevitable product of the unpopular and brutal nature of capitalism. 
					
					 This eloquently proves that capitalism based on individualism can never bring a genuine life, happiness and prosperity to the popular masses, and it tolls its death knell.
					
					  Latin American countries have emerged a strong force accelerating the revival of socialism, injecting fresh energy into the worldwide socialist movement.
					
					 The number of the countries aspiring after socialism including Venezuela, Bolivia, Nicaragua and Ecuador is on the steady increase in this region, inspired by the example set by Cuba.
					
					 They formed the ALBA, an organization for cooperation to accelerate the building of socialism against capitalism, while boosting the political, economic and military ties under the banner of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The member states of the ALBA are positively enforcing socialist policies such as the nationalization of energy resources and basic industries, land reform, free compulsory education and free medical care, achieving noticeable progress at a time when the capitalistic world is in the grip of financial and economic crises.
					
					 The stronger the attraction of socialism grows, the deeper the capitalist political and institutional crises get.
					
					 Louder voices concerned about the gloomy prospect of capitalism and confident of its collapse are heard from among media, religious and political circles in the capitalist countries. 
					
					 It is an inevitable development of history that the society based on individualism is bound to be replaced by the one based on collectivism.
					
					 Immense are the pride and self-confidence, joy of life and creative enthusiasm of the army and the people in the DPRK who have steadfastly advanced along the road of socialism under the uplifted banner of Songun despite the imperialists' blatant challenge and abuses. 
					
					 The DPRK, regarding socialism based on the Juche idea, the Songun idea, as an invincible treasured sword, is now dashing ahead towards a bright morrow, working miracles of history at a time when the world is suffering an upheaval.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK will surely emerge victors in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation true to the noble will of President Kim Il Sung and thus make the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's nation shine forever.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates a signed article to the 15th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science".
					 The work published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994) comprehensively clarifies the undisputed superiority of socialism to capitalism, the limitation of the preceding theory of socialism, the scientific accuracy of the Juche-oriented theory of socialism and the invincibility of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The publication of the work provided the army and people of the DPRK with a weapon for working harder to build mighty and prosperous socialist Korea with stronger faith that Korean-style socialism built by President Kim Il Sung and has been glorified by Kim Jong Il is the best.
					
					 Now the faith of the army and people of the DPRK in socialism finds a striking manifestation in living and struggling in the spirit of devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution and giving full play to the beautiful traits of collectivism in all fabrics of social life. It is displayed in bringing about uninterrupted leap forward and innovations in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK regard it a maxim of their life and struggle and a signpost of faith in socialism to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 The new great revolutionary surge being effected in the DPRK means a great surge in devotedly defending the leader and a great surge in the faith in socialism.
					
					 Collectivism serves as a bottom line of Korean-style socialism and noble spirit of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They are now giving full play to the advantages and invincibility of Korean-style socialism by dint of collectivism.
					
					 They are registering such signal successes one after another as knocking the gate to a thriving nation in various parts of the country, reaching at one go the goal for which others took a thousand steps in order to realize their far-reaching ambition and ideal. Their firm faith in the victory of socialism is the source of their fervent enthusiasm.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Celebrated in Italy and Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Celebrated in Italy and Russia
Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a book and photo exhibition took place in Italy and an explanatory session and a film show in Russia between October 14 and 24 to mark the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					On display at the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photographs on their immortal exploits and books and photographs on the Korean people in the efforts to build a thriving nation and reunify the country.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows was the DPRK film "Party Founding Memorial Tower".
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The chairman of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy said that the Workers' Party of Korea has won one victory after another, overcoming all difficulties and trials of history as it is guided by the Juche idea, founded by Kim Il Sung and developed and enriched by Kim Jong Il, and is pursuing the politics based on the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 The chairman of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the director of a Russian company and others stressed that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people would continue to dynamically advance along the road of Korean-style socialism chosen by themselves.

articles.title: Judicious Prophecy
articles.content:
Judicious Prophecy
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- It was in October Juche 43 (1954) when President Kim Il Sung visited an agricultural cooperative (then) in Jungsan County, South Phyongan Province.
					 The President, informed that more than 30 family members and relatives of the chairman of the cooperative management board were murdered by the U.S. imperialists, spent a night in his house to console him. 
					
					 Next day he went out to a ferry through weeds.
					
					 Let's look round the swamp, he said, and got on board a small boat.
					
					 After surveying the swamp to provide peasants with a happy life, the President sat knee to knee with them and said that if the swamp was dammed, they could reclaim about 100,000 phyong of fertile rice-field.
					
					 Listening to him, they were very surprised at the number of 100,000.
					
					 Even the villagers who had lived around the swamp where reed grew thick for scores of years did not know its acreage.
					
					 After the reclamation, the peasants measured the acreage, which showed that his prophecy came true.
					
					It made the peasants full of admiration, emotion and joy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno Granja Cooperativa de Unhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno Granja Cooperativa de Unhung
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja Cooperativa de Unhung del distrito de Thaechon.
					  El Dirigente se entero detalladamente del estado de faenas agricolas de este ano examinando varias plantas agricolas producidas en la granja.
					
					  Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los funcionarios, campesinos y tecnicos de la granja hayan logrado abundantes cosechas sin precedentes al realizar con esmero todas las faenas agricolas incluyendo el cultivo de doble cosecha dando pruebas de su ardiente determinacion patriotica de contribuir a la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Senalo que el orgulloso exito alcanzado este ano en la Granja Cooperativa de Unhung demuestra con practica que se puede lograr en todas partes un auge vertiginoso en la produccion agricola si trabajan tenazmente por elevar la fertilidad de la tierra y materializan consecuentemente la orientacion del partido de registrar la innovacion en la mejora de semillas.
					
					  Califico de exito realmente admirable el hecho de que los funcionarios y trabajadores de la granja hayan terminado excelentemente con sus propias fuerzas la construccion de gran magnitud incrementando sistematicamente la produccion de cereales con abnegados esfuerzos patrioticos.
					
					  Evaluo altamente los meritos de ellos expresandoles el agradecimiento y regalo tractores de nuevo modelo como reconocimiento a las proezas de la granja.
					
					  Uno de los problemas importantisimos en abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera es incrementar la produccion agricola, subrayo y presento las tareas programaticas que le incumben al sector agricola.
					
					  La tarea principal, que se presenta en la solucion del problema rural, es seguir materializando estrictamente la orientacion del partido de realizar una revolucion en la agricultura, senalo y apunto que esto deviene la garantia fundamental para lograr cambios trascendentales en la produccion agricola.
					
					Asevero que lo mas importante es ubicar las plantas y variedades en el principio de cultivo adecuado en tiempo y terreno apropiados, abonarlas y cuidarlas de manera cientifico-tecnica como lo demandan los autoctonos metodos agricolas.
					
					  Enfatizo que hay que mejorar con audacia la estructura de produccion agricola del pais adhiriendose al principio mencionado y de acuerdo con el clima natural de nuestro pais y ubicar en cada localidad y cada granja las plantas y variedades mas convenientes a las caracteristicas zonales y condiciones del suelo.
					
					  Destaco la importancia de desarrollar en gran medida el cultivo de doble cosecha senalando que en impulsar bien esta labor esta la gran reserva del aumento de la produccion de cereales en nuestro pais donde esta limitada la tierra cultivable. 
					
					　Para ese fin, hay que resolver la escasez de la fuerza laboral al distribuirla correctamente e impulsar activamente la mecanizacion de las faenas agricolas y cumplir a tiempo y con rapidez todas las faenas agricolas, asevero.
					
					  Sin registrar la innovacion en la mejora de semillas, es imposible observar el principio de cultivo adecuado en tiempo y terreno apropiado en la agricultura ni desarrollar el cultivo de doble cosecha, apunto.
					
					　Agrego que el dominio agricola debe asumir una posicion independiente en el mejoramiento de variedades y esforzarse mucho por desarrollar las variedades convenientes al clima y condiciones naturales de nuestro pais, incluyendo las que tengan alto rendimiento consumiendo poca cantidad de fertilizantes y creciendo rapido con resistencia al frio.
					
					  Dijo que el problema mas importante en la materializacion de la orientacion del partido de realizar una revolucion en la agricultura es desarrollar activamente la ciencia y tecnica agricolas.
					
					  Para ello, hay que fortalecer la asistencia al campo, tomar las medidas estatales para proveer de todo lo necesario en las zonas rurales y mejorar la direccion y la administracion sobre la economia rural, destaco.
					
					  Expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, la Granja Cooperativa de Unhung cumplira excelentemente su papel de vanguardia en la materializacion de la orientacion del partido de dar prioridad a la agricultura.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
  Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno las fabricas y empresas reconstruidas y ampliadas de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					  Tras ver los aspectos de varias maquinas herramienta CNC y los articulos elaborados del Combinado de Contadores de Amnokgang, la Fabrica de Cojinete de Suphung, la Fabrica 10 de Octubre y la Fabrica de Articulos de Uso Diario de Amnokgang, el Dirigente expreso gran satisfaccion de haberse realizado la modernizacion y cientifizacion de proceso de produccion.
					
					  Dijo que nuestra clase obrera logro gran avance en la produccion de maquinas al establecer el sistema de produccion basado en ciencias y tecnicas modernas conforme a la demanda de la epoca de la industria de informatica y particularmente, tomo firmemente las arterias de la tecnica CNC, lo cual es una gran victoria de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					  Senalo que la industria de construccion de maquinaria, nucleo de la industria pesada llego al nivel de punta lo cual aprueba fehacientemente a que altura llego la economia de Corea y continuo que este vertiginoso desarrollo es el gran fruto de la potencia espiritual del pueblo coreano que obtenia siempre las victorias registrando el progreso e innovacion.
					
					  Las fabricas pudieron convertirse en fabricas modelo de la modernizacion como resultado de haber concentrado todas las fuerzas en la transformacion tecnica en pleno acato a la idea del PTC de dar importancia a la ciencia, senalo y subrayo que todas las unidades deben aprender activamente el emprendedor espiritu de lucha de estas fabricas.
					
					  El Dirigente dirigio sobre el terreno la Planta Avicola de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					
					  El se mostro muy satisfecho de que los funcionarios y obreros de esta planta hayan logrado el  rapido desarrollo en la produccion de carne y huevos.
					
					  Anadio que es muy bueno lo que los funcionarios y empleados de esta fabrica crian muchos patos y cerdos al usar efectivamente la excrecion de gallos y evaluo en alto la hacendosa manera de trabajar de ellos.
					
					  Indico que en acato al proposito del PTC de suministrar abundantemente los alimentos subsidiarios al pueblo, en los ultimos anos, se construyeron modernamente por doquier las bases ganaderas como la granja avicola, la fabrica de cerdo, la granja de cabras y la de vacas y los criaderos de peces de tipo ultramoderno, que surten gran efecto y enseno que estos exitos orgullosos son una patente prueba de la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica del PTC de desarrollar en gran escala la ganaderia y piscicultura a la manera nuestra basadas en ciencias y tecnicas ultramodernas.
					
					  Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX se refiere a la visita de delegacion coreana a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX se refiere a la visita de delegacion coreana a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con la visita de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a los Estados Unidos, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio el dia 2 como lo siguiente:
					  La delegacion coreana encabezada por el jefe de la direccion de EE.UU. del MINREX realiza una visita a EE.UU. para participar en la XX reunion del "Dialogo de Cooperacion con el Nordeste Asiatico" auspiciada por el Instituto de Disputas y Cooperacion Internacionales de la Universidad de California y en el intercambio de opiniones bilaterales RPDC-EE.UU. organizado por el Comite Nacional de la Politica Exterior de EE.UU.
					
					  Durante la visita, ella se reunio con el embajador del Departamento de Estado norteamericano a instancias de el.
					
					  Este encuentro no fue un contacto previo para las conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU. y por consiguiente, no fue discutido en esa ocasion ningun problema sustancial sobre el dialogo entre los dos paises.
					
					  Ya es conocida en el mundo la posicion de la RPDC de conversar primero con EE.UU. y acudir segun su resultado al dialogo multilateral en que se incluyen tambien las conversaciones a 6 bandas.
					
					  Nuestra posicion partio de la razonable demanda de principios de que a fin de lograr la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, se debe anteponer el proceso de eliminacion cabal de la causa, que produjo nuestra posesion de armas nucleares, acabando con las relaciones hostiles entre ambas partes.  
					
					El proceso de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, que duraron 6 anos, demostro que si no se eliminan las relaciones hostiles y no se establece la confianza entre la RPDC y EE.UU., las 6 bandas hablarian por hablar por mucho que conversen.
					
					  Debido a EE.UU. que al cabo de acusar obstinada y unicamente el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos por parte de la RPDC, le aplico la sancion llevando este tema al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, resultaron suprimido el principio de respeto a la soberania e igualdad de la misma, que constituye el espiritu fundamental de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre, e invalidado este documento.
					
					  Aparte de la soberania politica de la RPDC que se vio violada, ella sufrio grandes perdidas tambien en el plano economico.
					
					  Pese a que paramos la construccion de las centrales atomicas basadas en el reactor de grafito, obra que impulsabamos con costosos esfuerzos desde la decada de 1980, se dio al traste la promesa de entregarnos dos reactores de agua ligera como recompensa y no hemos recibido considerables beneficios economicos correspondientes a la neutralizacion de las instalaciones nucleares en Nyongbyon.
					
					  En fin de cuentas, se llevo al fracaso solo nuestro plan de desarrollar nuestra propia industria nuclear con capacidad de dos millones de kilovatios.
					
					  Entonces, llegamos a la conclusion de que la RPDC y EE.UU., responsables del problema, deben reunirse primero para buscar una solucion racional.
					
					  Si se eliminan las  relaciones hostiles y se crea la confianza entre ambas partes, se dara un avance significativo en la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Ya que la RPDC ha aclarado con magnanimidad la posicion de acudir a las conversaciones multilaterales incluyendo la cita a 6 bandas despues de hablar con EE.UU., le toca a este el turno de tomar la decision.
					
					  Si EE.UU. no esta preparado todavia para hablar cara a cara con nuestro pais, iremos por nuestra senda.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intento de ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intento de ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el secretario de Defensa de Estados Unidos hizo publica una "declaracion conjunta" con los caudillos de la capa militar del Sur de Corea prometiendo de nuevo el ofrecimiento del "disuasivo ampliado" incluyendo el "paraguas nuclear".
					  Por otra parte, el presidente de la Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU., quien llego a Japon tras realizar debates de guerra en el Sur de Corea, expuso su posicion de rechazo al "no uso de armas nucleares de modo preventivo" disparateando que el "disuasivo ampliado" viene jugando hasta la fecha "gran papel para mantener la seguridad" de los paises aliados.
					
					  Esto deviene una muestra de la peligrosisima intencion de los imperialistas norteamericanos de provocar a toda costa la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado este lunes y continua:
					
					  Si bien EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea celebraron todos los anos alternando los lugares las reuniones del llamado "comite militar" y la "reunion consultiva para la seguridad", la reciente conspiracion para la guerra no tiene parangon en su caracter provocativo y peligroso.
					
					  Al insinuar que en la futura segunda guerra coreana, se movilizaran no solo el personal de combate para el refuerzo en el tiempo de guerra, definido anteriormente, sino tambien las tropas norteamericanas desplegadas en todo el mundo, EE.UU. expuso abiertamente su ambicion de agredir al Norte de Corea.
					
					  Lo mas grave del caso es que en la "declaracion conjunta" arriba mencionada esta documentado detalladamente el "disuasivo ampliado", concepto militar aparecido primero en la "declaracion conjunta" aprobada en la "reunion consultiva para la seguridad" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea efectuada en 2006.
					
					  El "dialogo", de que habla tanto EE.UU., no pasa de ser un engano encaminado a desarmar y aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Es absurdo el intento del imperio de sacar algun provecho a traves del ataque nuclear preventivo.
					
					  Si EE.UU. persigue de continuo la confrontacion nuclear sin pensar en cambiar su agresiva politica sobre Corea, se fortalecera mas el disuasivo nuclear de ella para la autodefensa.

articles.title: ATCC confirma el triunfo del socialismo
articles.content:
ATCC confirma el triunfo del socialismo
Pyongyang, 2 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Ya pasaron los 15 anos desde cuando el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo publica la obra maestra "El socialismo es ciencia".
					En la realidad fueron confirmadas claramente la justedad y la vitalidad de esta obra que argumenta de modo global la cientificidad y la veracidad del socialismo que es ideal y bandera revolucionaria de las masas populares que aspiran a la independencia.
					
					A finales del siglo pasado cuando fue derrumbado el socialismo en algunos paises los imperialistas y reaccionarios hablaron como si fracasara el socialismo y fuera erroneo su ideal y maniobraron desesperadamente para capitalizar el mundo.
					
					Ellos hablaron tanto como si tal "globalizacion" trajera una "oportunidad" y "prosperidad".
					
					Pero, en los paises que lo introdujeron, se crearon el caos politico y la catastrofe social y economica y los pueblos sufrieron las desgracias y las penalidades.
					
					La "globalizacion" del capitalismo se cayo en la crisis y fue rechazada en todas partes del mundo.
					
					En el nuevo siglo, los imperialistas buscaron la salida de esa crisis en la "globalizacion" de la "democracia liberal" apoyada en el metodo militar- "guerra antiterrorista"
					
					Pero, esto empujo a ellos en la mayor crisis.
					
					La desordenada politica financiera encaminada a evitar el aprieto financiero provocado por la "guerra antiterrorista" acelero el derrumbamiento del mercado de bienes raices y el estallido de la crisis financiera en Estados Unidos, lo cual fue convertido en un santiamen en la crisis economica a escala mundial debido a la "globalizacion" economica.
					
					En la escena caotica de la ley de selva engendrada por la "globalizacion" del capitalismo, la existencia de la humanidad esta amenazada gravemente tambien por las crisis de viveres, energia y ambiente, ademas de la gran crisis economica.
					
					Esta situacion horrible muestra que es el destino del individualismo, el camino hacia el capitalismo y el punto de llegada de la "globalizacion" del capitalismo y cual es el "fin de la historia" que persiguieron los imperialistas y reaccionarios.
					
					Despues del fin de la guerra fria la consecuencia catastrofica y la destruccion de la "globalizacion" del capitalismo devienen el producto inevitable del caracter antipopular y brutalidad del capitalismo.
					
					Esto da larga campanada del fin del capitalismo demostrando elocuentemente que el capitalismo basado en el individualismo no puede ofrecer la verdadera vida, la felicidad y la prosperidad a las masas populares.
					
					Los paises latinoamericanos aparecen como poderosas fuerzas para la rehabilitacion y el fortalecimiento del socialismo dando nuevo animo al movimiento socialista mundial.
					
					En esa region se incrementan uno tras otro los paises que aspiran al socialismo como Venezuela, Bolivia, Nicaragua y Ecuador siguiendo a Cuba.
					
					Ellos, al fortalecer los lazos politicos, economicos y militares bajo la bandera de la independencia antiimperialista, organizaron la Alianza Bolivariana para los Pueblos de Nuestra America (ALBA-TCP), organizacion de cooperacion para oponerse al capitalismo y acelerar la construccion socialista.
					
					Ahora cuando el mundo capitalista languidece en la crisis financiera y la economica, los paises miembros de la ALBA logran un desarrollo vertiginoso realizando activamente las medidas socialistas como la nacionalizacion de los recursos energeticos y la industria clave, la reforma agraria, la educacion obligatoria gratuita y el sistema de asistencia medica gratuita.
					
					A medida que se fortalece la atraccion del socialismo, se profundiza mas la crisis politica y la institucional del capitalismo.
					
					En los circulos de prensa, religion y politica de los paises capitalistas suenan altamente las voces que se preocupan de la perspectiva sombria del capitalismo y confirman la derrota de este.
					
					Es la inevitabilidad del desarrollo de historia el paso de la sociedad basada en el individualismo a la basada en el colectivismo.
					
					Son infinitos el orgullo, la dignidad, la alegria de la vida y el entusiasmo creativo del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, que pese al perverso desafio y la difamacion de los imperialista han recorrido con firmeza por el camino del socialismo bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					Ahora cuando todo el mundo sufre un torbellino, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que toma por medio omnipotente del triunfo el socialismo basado en la idea Juche, la del Songun, avanza hacia el iluminoso futuro creando los prodigios de la historia.
					
					En acato al gran proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea traeran sin falta el triunfo de la gran potencia prospera socialista sobre este territorio y bajo este cielo y exaltaran de generacion en generacion la dignidad y la gloria de la nacion Kim Il Sung.
